column5: Well thats the best idea i have seen for reducing the population of Asian carp so far. Eat the buggers.Sell them and make money doing it.That's why they were introduced to this country anyways
that sounds like a good idea ,, win - win situation out of something bad
Hopefully they don't make too much money off of it or they will want them in the great lakes.
yummy...perhaps New York will shars its Canada Goose with the carp people and the poor can eat fish and goose!....lol
this buggers was sell mostly every chinese supermarket!... soon or later metro will sale this buggers too... hope not... ha ha ha ha then best buy, futureshop, canadiantire... joke...
Turn 'em into fish meal, give the oceans a rest and all the cattle in the world a good cheap feed.

That guy trying to flog tonnes of that carp  crap should contact BC salmon farms-the price of their usual feedstock has risen and they're now trying to feed farmed fish things you would. not. believe.
